profile.name: Shan Le Fan (Andrea Fan)
profile.title: Frontend Developer && Marketer
profile.content1: Frontend Developer and Community Manager with over 3 years of experience building web applications using Next.js, React, and TypeScript, excelling in adaptable environments and cross-departmental collaboration.
profile.content2: Successfully led gamer community engagement, boosting interaction rates by over 10%, and leveraged automation tools and marketing strategies to streamline processes by 30%, driving $1M in seasonal revenue growth. Passionate about optimizing workflows with innovative tools to enhance user experience and business value.
